fields.name: indicator
fields.title: Indicator ID
fields.description: The indicator measured by the survey

fields.name: survey_mid_calendar_quarter
fields.title: Survey Midpoint Calendar Quarter
fields.description: The calendar quarter nearest to the midpoint of the survey fieldwork period.

fields.name: area_id
fields.title: Area ID
fields.description: An area_id from the specified area hierarchy.

fields.name: n_eff_kish
fields.title: Kish effective sample size
fields.description: The effective number of observations based on Kish effective sample size

fields.name: estimate
fields.title: Estimate
fields.description: The value of the survey estimate

fields.name: std_error
fields.title: Standard Error
fields.description: The standard error on the estimate

fields.name: ci_lower
fields.title: 95% Confidence Interval Lower Bound
fields.description: The value of the 95% confidence interval lower bound

fields.name: ci_upper
fields.title: 95% Confidence Interval Upper Bound
fields.description: The value of the 95% confidence interval upper bound

title: UNAIDS Survey Indicators Input
description: If data does not exist, please indicate so with the value "NA" and ignore any warning given by Excel.
